name: Audio Drive Neon
description: Experience your favorite music by cruising along or speeding through the mesmerizing neon roads! Play any song that you like!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM
